name: NeurOverride
description:
Trapped aboard the UTSA Niko, play as the only surviving crew member on a ship overrun by technology created to save and mutated to kill. Fight through the disfigured former members of your team in an attempt to escape with your life. 

NeurOverride is a space-themed horror game, focusing on survival and strategy. It was created for the Major Production of students at AIE Seattle -- The programming team included James Lyle, Trevor Liloia, Ginger Farrar, and Chelsey Lotts, while the art team included Maxanova Pantano, Savanna Pilkington, Kayleigh Wynn, August Mears, and Alexis Mosley.
